New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 28 points, matching a career-high for the Thunder in their season opener.
Chet Holmgren recorded a double-double with 25 points and 14 rebounds.
The game marked the season opener for both the Thunder and Nuggets.
Key Match Events: Chet Holmgren threw down a thunderous jam at 0:19 of the first quarter.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander extended OKC's lead with a layup in the fourth quarter.
Defensive plays by both teams, including 12 turnovers by the Nuggets, contributed to the Thunder's victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Ball Arena in Denver with an attendance of 19,786.
OKC and Denver have a head-to-head series history with the Thunder leading 1-0 in the regular season.
Others: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had 8 assists, while Nikola Jokic recorded 13 assists and 12 rebounds for the Nuggets.
